channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 17 Best White Elephant Gifts (2024): Legos, Desk Accessories
item.description: Bring the gift everyone will want to win from this year's holiday party, from a bathrobe for a bottle of wine to magnets they'll wish they could eat.

item.title: Trump Will Reportedly Block the US Government and Military From Buying EVs
item.description: Donald Trump’s attack on clean vehicles is shaping up to be bigger than previously thought.

item.title: UK consults on opt-out model for training AIs on copyrighted content

item.title: Code Assist, Google’s enterprise-focused coding assistant, gets third-party tools
item.description: Google on Tuesday announced support for third-party tools in Gemini Code Assist, its enterprise-focused AI code completion service. Code Assist launch...

item.title: Google says customers can use its AI in ‘high-risk’ domains, so long as there’s human supervision

item.title: Best Bird Feeders With Cameras, Tested and Reviewed (2024)
item.description: These bird feeders come with cameras and connected apps to let you see and learn about the birds in your neighborhood.

item.title: A Third Person Has Received a Transplant of a Genetically Engineered Pig Kidney
item.description: A 53-year-old woman was the third to undergo the transplant procedure. Researchers are hoping to monitor the long-term effects.
